summary: This is an email chain forwarding information about a Daily Mail interview with Ghislaine Maxwell from prison. The emails discuss the upcoming publication of the interview and share links to the article.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.role: Interview subject, convicted associate of Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of a Daily Mail interview conducted while she was incarcerated. The email chain is about forwarding this interview information.

events.title: Daily Mail publishes interview with Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: The Daily Mail publishes an interview with Ghislaine Maxwell conducted while she is in prison.

events.title: Email forwarding interview information
events.description: An email is sent forwarding information and a link to the Daily Mail interview with Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell gave an interview from prison to the Daily Mail in November 2021.
The interview was published online on or around November 13, 2021.
The email chain shows internal communication about the publication of this interview.
